topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack 1.1: Creating an Instance Snapshot

body.p: A snapshot is a new image based on a running instance. That snapshot can be used as the base for new instances.

section.title: Creating a snapshot

li.p: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Helion Dashboard.
Click the Instances link on the Project dashboard Compute panel.
In the Instances screen, for the instance you want to create a snapshot, click Create Snapshot.
On the Create Snapshot tab, enter a name for the snapshot.
Click Launch to launch the instance.
A snapshot image is created on the Images link.

section.p: When you create a snapshot, by default the snapshot image can be used only with the current project and it can be deleted.
You can make the snapshot public for use in all projects in the domain and you can protect the image from being deleted.
